quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.issued_shares_note: The number of issued shares has been adjusted for the announced rights issue of 3 rights shares for every 1 existing share with an ex-date of 25 January 2024. The number of issued shares before the adjustment is 708,466,773 shares as at 31 March 2024.
quote.summary: IBO Technology Co Ltd is a company mainly engaged in providing industrial Internet of Things (IoT) solutions and services and industrial digitalisation solutions and services. The Company operates through four segments. The Intelligent Terminal Products Sales segment is engaged in the development, production and sales of IoT intelligent terminal products. The System Integration segment provides comprehensive and customized system solutions, including overall system planning, development and design, system equipment procurement and others. The Software Development segment plans and designs software system frameworks and function lists for customers, and provides software application development services. The System Maintenance Services segment provides software and hardware system maintenance services for information systems, including system equipment maintenance and management, database maintenance, daily system monitoring and system upgrades.
